document.full_text: middle east peace envoy george mitchell, who has led the obama administration's failed effort to restart direct negotiations between israel and the palestinians, plans to resign friday, a u.s. official said.
document.title: mideast peace envoy mitchell to resign: official
lines_and_colors: middle east peace envoy george mitchell, who has led the obama administration's failed effort to restart direct negotiations between israel and the palestinians, plans to resign friday, a u.s. official said.
